title: DRINK WHEEL
text: Enable the <highlight>Drink Wheel</highlight> to add a fun twist to your drinking game! The wheel gives you a 50% chance of taking 1 sip, with smaller odds for 2, 3, or 4 sips — or even having to down your whole drink.

title: LUCKY COIN FLIP
text: If you are chose flip a coin and call it - guess right, and you get to see the question. Guess wrong, and never know.
